reviewText: for a vhs this old to work as fine as it did i was shocked. also the price was very reasonable. so i won out on every count, thank you. i had been looking all over for this. i was lucky i found one.

This movie, a year older and much funnier than the later Crystal/Deniro movie, has a great story, wonderful cast, and is just a better movie. I think it's a shame it was never released on DVD.  I keep hoping....
